CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: It was also found that the blend films of PIDT - EHNT , PIDT - DTNT , and PIDT-C12NT with PC71BM showed surface roughness with rootmean - square ( rms ) of 4.0 , 2.6 , and 0.4 nm , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PIDT - EHNT |
| PIDT - DTNT |
| PIDT-C12NT |
| PC71BM |

Explanation:

The "Material Name" entities in the given paragraph are:

1. PIDT - EHNT
2. PIDT - DTNT
3. PIDT-C12NT
4. PC71BM

These entities are materials mentioned in the context of the blend films' surface roughness.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PC71BM |

Explanation:

After re-evaluating the paragraph, only PC71BM can be confirmed as a material name with certainty. The other entities (PIDT - EHNT, PIDT - DTNT, and PIDT-C12NT) are mentioned in the context of being blended with PC71BM, but their individual existence as materials is not explicitly stated in the paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: It was also found that the blend films of PIDT - EHNT , PIDT - DTNT , and PIDT-C12NT with PC71BM showed surface roughness with rootmean - square ( rms ) of 4.0 , 2.6 , and 0.4 nm , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

Here are the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph:

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 4.0 |
| 2.6 |
| 0.4 |
| nm |

Note that I have included "nm" (nanometer) as a property value because it is a unit of measurement that is necessary to understand the magnitude of the roughness values.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

After reviewing the paragraph, I believe that all of the identified entities are values of material properties. Here is the updated table:

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 4.0 |
| 2.6 |
| 0.4 |
| nm |

The values 4.0, 2.6, and 0.4 are the root-mean-square (RMS) surface roughness values for the blend films of PIDT-EHNT, PIDT-DTNT, and PIDT-C12NT with PC71BM, respectively. The unit of measurement for these values is nanometers (nm). Therefore, all of these entities are values of material properties.
